title: DJ Sona Power Chord visuals
body:
So, while playing DJ Sona today, I noticed that each of her forms have their own special particles for her Power Chord.
Upon switching to a new form, the particles from the previous form remain on the next form.
For example, lets say you got power chord while on Kinetic, then toggle into Concussive; the visual for Power Chord from Kinetic is now on Concussive.
The same can be repeated for the other forms as well.
I'm sure it wasn't implemented yet or if anyone noticed but, it'd be nice for Power Chord to also change when cycling through her different forms.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix! :]
